thread.section_title: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals | smokymtndreams.com
thread.title: Dianna
thread.title_full: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals reviewed by Dianna

author: Dianna
title: Dianna
text: Colonial Properties was extremely helpful and did everything they said they would do. I would definitely recommend them. The cabin we rented was nice but could have been better. It has very large windows that needed a good cleaning and there were two outside garbage cans strapped to the front porch next to the swing. We were on our honeymoon so the ambience could have been a little better. The location was very nice and quiet but there are other cabins close by. Overall we were happy. Thank you!
